cv_data.content:
MOHAMED SALAH SHAHIN
Flutter Developer | Expert in Flutter & Dart
GitHub: https://github.com/shaheen200 | Email: mohamedbedosalah.2002@gmail.com

PROFESSIONAL SUMMARY 
Results-driven Flutter Developer with strong expertise in building and deploying high-quality cross-platform mobile applications. Proficient in Flutter and Dart, with solid experience in state management, API integration, and performance optimization. Adept at translating business requirements into innovative, user-friendly, and scalable mobile solutions. Passionate about delivering exceptional user experiences and staying updated with the latest mobile development trends.
CORE COMPETENCIES 
Flutter & Dart Development (Cross-Platform Mobile Apps)
State Management (Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, GetX)
UI/UX Design Implementation (Material Design, Cupertino Widgets)
API Integration (RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Firebase)
Database Management (SQLite, Hive, Firebase Firestore)
Performance Optimization (App Speed, Memory Usage, Responsiveness)
Version Control & CI/CD (Git, GitHub Actions, Bitbucket Pipelines)
Deployment & Publishing (Google Play Store, Apple App Store)

EDUCATION 
Bachelor of Computer Science, Menoufia University
Specialization: Software Engineering (Flutter Development Focus) | GPA: 2.71/4.0 (Good)
Expected Graduation: January 2026
CERTIFICATIONS & TRAINING 
• AWS Academy Graduate – Cloud Foundations
AWS Academy | Issued: March 2025 | Duration: 20 Hours
KEY PROJECTS 
Car Rental System – Cross-platform mobile application (Android & iOS) for car rental services, integrated with a web-based admin dashboard for fleet and booking management.
Razan Trading Platform – E-commerce mobile application with inventory tracking, order management, and secure payment gateway integration.
Planet Online Store – Full-featured online shopping platform with responsive design, product catalog, and user-friendly checkout process.
Smart Networks Management System – Web and mobile solution for monitoring, configuring, and managing network infrastructure efficiently.

TECHNICAL SKILLS 
Programming: Dart, Java, Kotlin (basic)
Frameworks & Libraries: Flutter, Provider, Riverpod, Bloc, GetX
Tools & Platforms: Android Studio, Visual Studio Code, Firebase, Git, GitHub, CI/CD Pipelines
APIs & Backend Integration: RESTful APIs, GraphQL, Firebase Cloud Functions
Databases: SQLite, Hive, Firebase Firestore, MySQL
UI/UX: Material Design, Cupertino Widgets, Responsive Design
 

SOFT SKILLS 
Leadership & Team Management
Problem-Solving & Critical Thinking
Agile & Scrum Team Collaboration
Effective Communication & Interpersonal Skills
Time Management & Task Prioritization

ACHIEVEMENTS
• Increased mobile app performance by up to 40% through optimization techniques.
• Delivered 5+ production-grade apps with 10,000+ total downloads.
• Implemented CI/CD pipelines reducing release time by 50%.
• Recognized as AWS Academy Graduate – Cloud Foundations.
LANGUAGES 
English: Advanced (Reading & Writing)
education: Bachelor of Computer Science, Menoufia University
AWS Academy | Issued: March 2025 | Duration: 20 Hours
• Recognized as AWS Academy Graduate – Cloud Foundations.

messages.content: Let's get started! Based on your CV, I'd like to follow up on your experience as a Flutter Developer. Can you elaborate on how you've applied Agile methodologies in your previous projects, and what specific tools or techniques have helped you manage iterations and meet project deadlines?

Let's dive deeper into your experience with Agile methodologies. Can you provide a concrete example of how you implemented Scrum principles in a previous Flutter project, such as how you structured your team or handled sprint planning and retrospectives?
